title: Royal Enfield Himalayan 450
description: Built for all roads and no roads. The all-new Himalayan 450 features Royal Enfield's first liquid-cooled engine, the Sherpa 450. With its rally-inspired ergonomics and advanced suspension, it's designed to conquer the toughest terrains. Pair it with a purpose-built Adventure helmet featuring a peak and wide viewport for the ultimate overlanding experience.
